segments.text: The sink is overflowing—how did that even happen?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading down like a waterfall onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's right there, but totally zoned out on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron are spotless so far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I see the boy on the stool, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are spreading out—it's gonna tip!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, looking triumphant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below is all excited, palm up for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sneaky duo they are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's open, letting in that fresh garden air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, it's a slippery hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes on the counter could crash if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene caught me off guard completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything's so ordinary yet on the edge of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
